languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% dodge until the end of the round. Stacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用导航者能力时，都会获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，效果持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束为止。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用导航者能力时，都会获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，效果持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束为止。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Применяя силу навигатора, персонаж получает +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Применяя силу навигатора, персонаж получает +15% к уклонению до конца раунда. Эффект суммируется.
Применяя силу навигатора, персонаж получает +15% к уклонению до конца раунда. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 使用者が航宙士パワーを使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}終了時まで、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が15%増加する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が航宙士パワーを使用するたび、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}終了時まで、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が15％増加する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador usa un poder de navegante, obtiene +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta finalizar el {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador usa un poder de navegante, obtiene +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta finalizar la {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger eine Navigatorkraft einsetzt, erhält er bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger eine Navigatorkraft einsetzt, erhält er +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. Addiert sich.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir de navigateur, il bénéficie de +15 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir de Navigateur, il bénéficie de +15 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir de Navigateur, il bénéficie de +15 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, her Rotacı gücü kullandığında +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
